identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Racing meets Cyberpunk
Content is King: Action shots drive the narrative

typography.instructions: Install '@fontsource/oxanium' and '@fontsource/space-grotesk'. Use Oxanium for all H1-H3 headers. Use Space Grotesk for body text and data tables.

textures: Noise overlays (opacity 0.05) to reduce digital flatness

rules: Never center text by default (except Hero)

button.style: bg-primary text-primary-foreground font-black uppercase tracking-wider skew-x-[-10deg] hover:skew-x-0 transition-transform px-8 py-4 rounded-none border-2 border-transparent hover:border-white

card.style: bg-surface border border-white/10 hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors p-6 backdrop-blur-md relative overflow-hidden group
card.enhancement: Add a 'racing stripe' div on the left edge that glows on hover

input.style: bg-black/50 border-white/20 focus:border-primary text-white rounded-none h-12

section_hero.description: Full height, video/image background, massive typography.
section_hero.layout: Overlay text bottom-left or center. High contrast.

section_registration.description: Multi-step wizard. Step 1: Personal Info. Step 2: Categories. Step 3: Payment.
section_registration.style: Clean, focused, no distractions. Progress bar visible.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Run `npm install @fontsource/oxanium @fontsource/space-grotesk` or import them in index.css.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update `tailwind.config.js` with the Midnight Asphalt palette and custom font families.
3. SETUP SHADCN: Customize basic components (Button, Input, Card) to match the 'Anti-AI' racer aesthetic (skewed, sharp edges).
4. BUILD LAYOUT: Create the pages defined in the prompt (Home, About, Categories, Registration, etc.) using the Tetris Grid.
5. FORM LOGIC: Implement the multi-step registration form with strict validation for the 32 categories.
6. USE IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs for placeholders. DO NOT use generic placeholders.
universal_guidelines: Create depth through layered design elements.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
